node.text:
We want to ensure that great tasting and sustainably grown coffee is available for generations to come. 🌎☕ ⁣
⁣
Visit the link in our bio to discover how our plant scientists have made a major breakthrough by developing low carbon coffee ⬆️⁣
⁣
#ClimateAction #Coffee #Innovation
Tenho interesse em fazer parceria com a marca😍😍

چی میشه رد بشی از پیجمون❤😍
یه نگاهی کنی به میوه خشکامون😉
تقصیر دل چیه ، آرزوش شده بشی یکی از مشتریامون
🥰❤
I’ve just seen the video of their CEO🤬 where do these people come from what the hell is wrong with them! It scares me so much that people in such positions think this way....vile man 👹
🚫🚫🚫🚫 DO NOT TEST ON ANIMALS RIGHT NOW

Increadible! I dont think i ever seen so much blatant greenwashing from any company. Selective breeding of crops to increase yield is hardly a breakthrough! It's been happening since humans first moved into agriculture, and to try and pass this off as a move to reduce carbon, you must think your customers are really stupid.. While were on coffee, how about making your instant coffee jar lids from metal instead of plastic? Did you know that metal, unlike plastic, is fully recyclable over and over again?  And it's biodegradable too.

Ridículo não voltar a lata de Nescau tradicional, esse novo sabor é ruim. Qual a dificuldade de voltar o antigo, teria demanda com certeza. E não adianta responder o de sempre, resposta padrão ou dizer que o sabor é o mesmo e só mudou a lata, não é verdade, melhor nem responder. Uma pena esse descaso.

Nestlé was named one of the worst three plastic polluters following 239 cleanups and brand audits in 42 countries last October. The company was also named the worst plastic polluter following 2017 and 2019waste and brand audits in the Philippines. Nestlé sells non-recyclable sachets throughout Southeast Asia that frequently end up polluting waterways and our oceans.
Hello I am Mehmet Erkul Turkey Konya Karapinar I am 34 years old I am unemployed and I have health problems I would like to help you if I could help you so much 😢😢😢

Upon looking at the link you have provided, in fact, only 62% of your plastic is recyclable or reusable and you are only aiming to reduce virgin plastics one third by 2025. Your current recycled plastic content globally is 4.2%!!! That’s ridiculous! It’s simply not good enough. Your long standing and continuous pollution to the planet is absolutely inexcusable. All plastic usage must be eradicated, and only biodegradable, recyclable and reusable options used by 2025. In fact it should be done sooner. In the meantime your company should invest some of its immense billions profit to cleaning up the planet from the mess you’ve made.
“water shouldn’t be a human right” did i hear that right? don’t you steal that water from natural springs and then sell it to the world with unethical promotion and child labor
You’ll take down climate change but steal water from those in need…
You’ll take down climate change but steal water from those in need…
